entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Athabasca
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Athabasca 11:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: ENE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
